segments.text: I am looking at this scene, and I can almost feel my blood pressure starting to rise.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can anyone be so utterly blind and deaf to their immediate surroundings?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is literally overflowing the kitchen sink, yet she just calmly polishes a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is in a growing puddle, and she shows no sign of even noticing it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, her children are engaging in incredibly dangerous and unsupervised behavior.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy is absolutely going to fall off that stool and hurt himself badly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, actively encouraging the whole risky enterprise.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me furious that she isn't supervising them or even aware of the hazards.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water damage to the cabinets and floor will be extensive and costly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is a recipe for disaster and entirely unnecessary trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to walk right in there and turn off that faucet myself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's infuriating to watch such clearly avoidable accidents unfold like this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to pay a lot more attention in this chaotic household.
segments.speaker: PAR
